channel.title: Where can i find servers IP address?
channel.description:
Hi When i download a private server and press 'Run.bat' it says
'Please enter IP address'
I know now that i have to enter the Servers IP address, but where can i find that IP address? :confused:
Some ppl say it is in the 'Client.java' folder in the files map, but i couldnt find it :(
Tnx ;)

item.title: Where can i find servers IP address?
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

This is not RS2. This is the RSC section.
